screen_desc: The screenshot displays a Costco sign-in page on a mobile device. It prompts the user to enter their email address and password for authentication. There are options to remember the user's sign-in and a link to create a new account. Below the sign-in button, the terms and conditions and privacy rights are listed.
action_think: The user has already added the LG Ultragear to the cart and is ready for checkout. Since the shopping cart has been cleared, the next steps are to select the checkout option and complete the purchase.
action_plan: Select the checkout option from the shopping cart screen
Finish the checkout process by providing payment and personal information
action_desc: click on the shopping cart icon located at the top right.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
prev_action_result: You have successfully removed the LG UltraGear 32" Class QHD Gaming Monitor from the cart. To complete the user request, you will need to add the LG Ultragear to the cart on Costco and then select checkout.
